issue.title: Joint::GetAngle returns Angle, which is confusing for non-angular joints

content.raw:
[related question](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/8340/get-translation-of-prismatic-joints-through-c-api/?sort=latest)

Maybe we could deprecate `math::Angle Joint::GetAngle` in favor of `double Joint::GetPosition` and create `GetAngle` functions in the relevant joint specific headers (like `RevoluteJoint.hh`, `UniversalJoint.hh`, etc)?
